query.select: DISTINCT LISTAGG(VESSEL_FEATURES.NAME, ' - ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY VESSEL_FEATURES.NAME)
DISTINCT LISTAGG(REGISTRATION_LOCATION.LABEL, ' - ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY REGISTRATION_LOCATION.LABEL)
DISTINCT LISTAGG(VESSEL_FEATURES.LENGTH_OVER_ALL, ' - ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY VESSEL_FEATURES.LENGTH_OVER_ALL)
(SELECT CONCAT(LAST_NAME,' ', FIRST_NAME) FROM PERSON INNER JOIN ACTIVITY_CALENDAR A on PERSON.ID = A.RECORDER_PERSON_FK WHERE A.ID = ACTIVITY_CALENDAR.ID)
query.from: INNER JOIN PROGRAM on PROGRAM.ID = ACTIVITY_CALENDAR.PROGRAM_FK
INNER JOIN VESSEL on ACTIVITY_CALENDAR.VESSEL_FK = VESSEL.ID

LEFT OUTER JOIN VESSEL_REGISTRATION_PERIOD ON VESSEL.ID = VESSEL_REGISTRATION_PERIOD.VESSEL_FK AND NOT( (VESSEL_REGISTRATION_PERIOD.END_DATE <= &endDateVesselRegistration OR VESSEL_REGISTRATION_PERIOD.END_DATE IS NULL) AND (VESSEL_REGISTRATION_PERIOD.START_DATE > &endDateVesselRegistration ) )
LEFT OUTER JOIN LOCATION REGISTRATION_LOCATION ON VESSEL_REGISTRATION_PERIOD.REGISTRATION_LOCATION_FK = REGISTRATION_LOCATION.ID

LEFT OUTER JOIN VESSEL_FEATURES ON VESSEL.ID = VESSEL_FEATURES.VESSEL_FK AND NOT( (VESSEL_FEATURES.END_DATE < &endDateVesselFeature OR VESSEL_FEATURES.END_DATE IS NULL) AND (VESSEL_FEATURES.START_DATE > &endDateVesselFeature) )
LEFT OUTER JOIN SURVEY_MEASUREMENT ON ACTIVITY_CALENDAR.ID = SURVEY_MEASUREMENT.ACTIVITY_CALENDAR_FK AND ( PMFM_FK = (SELECT ID FROM PMFM WHERE LABEL = 'SURVEY_QUALIFICATION'))
LEFT OUTER JOIN QUALITATIVE_VALUE ON SURVEY_MEASUREMENT.QUALITATIVE_VALUE_FK = QUALITATIVE_VALUE.ID
